document.full_text: two new york bus drivers have been arrested for wrongfully obtaining commercial driver's licenses in a widening crackdown sparked by a deadly bronx bus crash, officials said on thursday.
document.title: arrests made for bogus drivers' licenses in ny bus crackdown
lines_and_colors: two new york bus drivers have been arrested for wrongfully obtaining commercial driver's licenses in a widening crackdown sparked by a deadly bronx bus crash, officials said on thursday.
